docs.text: The goal of this site is to document the fundamental tools necessary to start coding Java for the First Tech Challenge. This guide is intended for beginner coders, or those who are deciding step up from block coding. Basic proficiency in the Java programming language is recommended.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: All Java programming for FTC is done through Android Studio, which you can download here . Instructions for setting up your FTC project can be found here . Now that your project is set up, let's start by going over some fundamentals.
docs.title: Introduction
